occupation: Co-Founder at  Nano Technologies Pte Ltd
headline: Co-Founder at Nano Technologies Pte Ltd
summary: A software engineer which luckily have opportunity to build many exciting products varies from e-commerce & crowd funding websites, mobile applications, consumer hardware products. Love to solve challenging problems and create value.

experiences.title: Co-Founder
experiences.location: Hanoi, Thành Phố Hà Nội, Vietnam

experiences.title: Senior Software Developer
experiences.description: Took responsibility of low-level software in inAiR system, include Android kernel & native system development, customizing Android rendering/compositing engine to support stereoscopic 3D rendering. In charge of system design/infrastructure/devops/backend development. In charge of R&D in the company, which involves machine learning, virtual reality, computer vision, kinect, hardware development... Later become software team lead, take charge of all software development in Seespace.

education.school: Hanoi University of Science and Technology

accomplishment_patents.title: Method and apparatus for controlling video content on a display
